participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious and easygoing, enjoys discussing films and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: I've been retired for a few years. I go gambling in my spare time. I move south during the winter. I like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, she loves digital art and often seeks to express her emotions through various forms of creativity.
participant_2.background: My dream in life is to work from home. I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. I dye my hair every three months. I've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. I faint at the sight of blood.

content.text: I like movies but I am studying Btech due to family problems
Oh no, what is wrong with that?
Money plays a key role in everyone's life
Oh, so you are a student?
Oh, I see. Do you have any hobbies?
Oh, that's interesting. What do you do for a living?
